verbs.description: [ARG1: Stocks] [V: closed] [ARGM-MNR: lower] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump cast doubt on US - China trade negotiations and as House Speaker Paul Ryan 's deadline for a new NAFTA deal passed . The 10-year Treasury yield rose as high as 3.12 %] .

Stocks closed lower Thursday after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: cast] [ARG1: doubt] [ARG2: on US - China trade negotiations] and as House Speaker Paul Ryan 's deadline for a new NAFTA deal passed . The 10-year Treasury yield rose as high as 3.12 % .
